name: Simia
description:
Simia is a small adventure game about an explorer and a monster.

  • Trek through an unknown land, earning the trust of an unknown village.
  • Switch between the explorer and the monster for different actions and interactions
  • Make your way through a perilous dungeon
  • Enjoy the game for FREE

If you liked the game, please consider buying the digital artbook, get to see concept art of how the character and environment where designed.

Programmer, Concept Artist: @Gattanima

Pixel Artist:@GWStoop

Music: Desia
